name: The Post-Grocery Conundrum
description:
You've just made the seventh trip from the car that everyone knows all too well.

But the struggle isn't over yet.

Try packing all your food into your small fridge in your 1-bedroom apartment, in this lovingly crafted puzzle game, The Post-Grocery Conundrum.

Controls:

     Left Mouse Button to pick up and drop items

     A/D to rotate items

     Shift to slow the rate of rotation

Credits:

ProgrammerAndy BaeArtistWebb MontgomeryComposerHannah Whitlow

Made as a part of Ludum Dare 42 - 'Running out of Space'
